name: Landian Foriegner
description:
A wizard meets some sorcerers and they all collectively chicken out of their quest

IMPORTANT!! 

HOW TO PLAY:

This is a two player game, though you can play it with one player as well by controlling one character at a time.

PLAYER 2 (SANDY) CONTROLS:

Use WASD to control Sandy. During the sections of the game where she is flying, you can press F or Q to shoot Magic ,that  can be used to destroy the flying cubes that chase Egbertina down . It is vital that you do this to help her.

PLAYER 1 (EGBERTINA) CONTROLS:

Use the ARROW keys to control Egbertina. You can press space to jump, and press space again when you are midair to create a temporary platform that you can stand on. 

Press SPACE to advance the dialogue

Please run the game in fullscreen as the windowed mode cuts some off the content off.
